question: [File: aptos-core/third_party/move/move-vm/runtime/src/interpreter_caches.rs] [Function: get_or_create_frame_cache_non_generic()] [Memory exhaustion] Can an attacker repeatedly deploy and call unique non-generic functions to fill function_instruction_caches without bound, each creating a new Rc<RefCell<FrameTypeCache>> that persists for the entire transaction block execution?
